name: BLEED (itch) (RAPD)
description:
In a dystopian cyberpunk future, you are a trainde assassin. Tasked with eliminating three corrupt priority targets, you are to sneak, dash and slash your way through the decrepit city in this first-person stealth game.

Features:

 - Sneak through the shadows, acoiding the vision of your enemies

 - Narrowly escape detection by dashing through the shine of street lamps

 - Take out enemies in your way one by one

 - Utilise your surroundings to destroy light sources

Developed by RAPD

Based in New Zealand
